dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 7002 EH: Gateway Solidarity Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.official-title: To authorize the Gateway Arch in St. Louis, Missouri, to be illuminated by blue and yellow lights in support of Ukraine.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Gateway Solidarity Act.

section.header: Illumination of the Gateway Arch in Support of Ukraine

paragraph.text: To show support and solidarity with the Ukrainian people, the Secretary of the Interior shall illuminate the Gateway Arch in St. Louis, Missouri, by blue and yellow lightsâ€”

subparagraph.text: in 2022, within 15 days following enactment of this act, for no fewer than 5 consecutive days; and

annually on August 24, in recognition of Ukrainian Independence Day, until the President reports to Congress that the government of the Russian Federation has ceased its destabilizing activities with respect to the sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives July 19, 2022.
